alert.note: Alert for Posey (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 9:12PM EST until January 12 at 5:57PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at Mount Vernon. Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. .Recent heavy rains in the Ohio River basin are expected to cause rises in the river with multiple locations rising above flood stage this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY, JANUARY 12... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Wednesday, January 12. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 34.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 42.5 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday, January 12. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
